title: were you once trolled because of your name?
body: someone today just told me league>dota :/

replies.body:
"IM GONNA HUCK U SO FARD HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH XDDDDDDDDDD!!!!!!!!11!!!!!"
"k"
+1 for dat name.

Somewhat related
I used to be a soraka only player and my account was named "Sorakacare"
I used to go into ARAMs and if i rolled soraka, I would declare sorakacare and only heal "humans without a history of mental illness or preexisting medical conditions"
I wouldn't heal yordles, void creatures, or other nonhumans.
People were not amused

Wait, I'm a lil confused. Is Sorakacare not a pun for Obamacare? In which case, Obamacare extended medical coverage to those you listed. So why would you only help those without it lol?

On a side note, this video is funny.

https://youtu.be/sx2scvIFGjE
And I mean, such assholes, how could they not be amused ? :/
No, but I did get someone complimenting me on the fact that it was 3 nouns .--.
Blue is not a noun. :X
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bZmsol7vEj0/T1HOEl23zaI/AAAAAAAABNY/S_sLw902Gps/s1600/X+superntaural+exactly.gif
Well. If you refer to the color itself, woupdnt that be a noun, rather than an adjetive?... granted in your name it would be an adjective.
I'm guessing he was confused.
I was trolled a lot when I was using my old name...and one time on Xbox Live I ragequit a game of Dying Light and got group messages saying that I should change my name to weakboss.
what was your old name?

...

Endercreeper42

_walk of shames out_
Oh, there is nothing wrong with that. It would be a lot worse if it was something like CODisKING69 or TwilightFan33.
Or XXXpussyslayer171XXX
Before the language censor on names was tightened up me and my friends changed our friend's name to xxBitchSlayerxx69. He was not amused.
Lol that's not even bad, people are just dicks. Hope you're more successful with your new name.
A lot of people think my name is "DarkenedAnus" when they first see it...
I can see that
People ban Bard still. :<
I imagine you play Dota actively then?
play both games every days
I respect people that play both.  Lots of people that only play one always hate on the other without really knowing enough to have a valid argument.
both games have their unique champs/heroes, for example vladimir isn't in dota 2. i like league, i like dota2, but i hate riot.
I've been saying this for years now.

I've never been trolled over my name, but since I type so properly and like using the little faces and all that, people usually assume I'm a girl. :P 

... and, you know how creepy the internet is about girls.
What about grills?
Well everyone wants one of those new, shiny Coleman models! They go crazy over them and hit on people to try and get at them. Internet guys fucking love their hamburgers and steaks, you know. xD
Coke > Pepsi qq
For whatever reason I've been called a furry before.

People have called me Patrick in the past or Starmie.
Like once everyone started saying a bunch of Spomgebob jokes involving Patrick at me.
I was traumatized and now have PTSD.
Staryu?
https://m.popkey.co/d7edf3/Xgka5.gif
Always remember, other people can have it worse ._.
Relevant name.

Someone tried to spoil Madoka for me, I lied and said I finished it at the time.. I didn't. BUT IT WORKED. 
https://i.imgflip.com/wpvuw.gif
That GIF is so remarkably appropriate.
She almost looks like Agrias from Final Fantasy Tactics...
Yeah when I'm Ashe or somebody else is Ashe
Aram everyone in the game fed the poro

"Man you really live up to your name"

:|

A lot of people either think my name is awesome and call me an "incredibly fast doggo" when i play warwick or nasus, OR they think i'm just a huge Undertale nerd (that one tilts me). 
{{summoner:6}} {{champion:19}}
Once had someone tell me that i should change my name to MorgBodyPillow after getting stomped in lane
Oooh, I just realized what your name is. Zeus has Refresh Orb, wow I feel terribad for not getting that reference.

Not really troll, but I regret my name everyday :((((

It's so easy to win arguments agaisnt me, they just play the "stfu 16 yo i fcked ur mom" card.

Once had a guy named "No Random" and he literally asked to pick the champion for the one for all game randomly.
I LOLed so hard
Somewhat often, and then I changed it!  It'll forever be a lesson and lost in the past. :D
If my zeus bought a refresher i would be pretty happy.

I got called 8 once

FeelsBadMan

Not actually trolled but called out and reported for having a "homophobic name". 
Then there are the "%%%got" comments, askings if i want to suck their dicks etc. 
Most common comment is this stupid unicorns dancing on rainbows >.> 
And sometimes actually gays add me ^^
